summary: Charter school participation in the National School Lunch Program has increased in the past 5 years. But participation rates are uneven. In 13 states, all charter schools participated. In 5 states, less than half did. How can the Food and Nutrition Service (FNS) address this? More data—FNS hasn't attempted a study of charter school participation since 2018 and could look for cost-effective ways to get...
title: School Meal Programs: Additional Data and Outreach Could Help Charter School Participation
